forceSignon.description: Please enter the requested iSeries logon information

scriptSave.title: Save Script
scriptSave.failed: Script could not be saved to server.
scriptSave.exist: Script with the same file name exists. Do you want to overwrite?

ctcPrompt.title: Reuse CTC
ctcPrompt.info1: There is a CTC available for logon to this host system. Please select the User Id below to reuse its Cached Token Credential
ctcPrompt.infon: There are multiple CTCs available for logon to this host system. Please select the User Id below to reuse its Cached Token Credential

login.copyright: Rocket Software, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
login.duoMsg: Invalid Duo configurations. Please check and modify your Duo configurations in Rocket TE Administration Console.
login.content: Welcome to Rocket TE Web Edition. You are logging in with reserved password, please reset your password.
login.must: Contains a number and a string
login.pattern: The password can only contain Latin-1 characters
login.reserved: 'password' is a reserved password. Enter another value.

totp.title: Multi-factor authentication(MFA)
totp.setupDesc: Set up a mobile device app to receive MFA codes for sign-on verification. Apps can include: Microsoft Authenticator, Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.
totp.secretDesc: Use an authenticator app from your mobile device to scan.
totp.unableToScan: If you are unable to scan,
totp.verifyCode: Verify the code from the app
totp.scanDesc: Open the multi-factor authenticator (TOTP) app on your mobile device to view your authentication code.
totp.invalid: Multi-factor code verification failed. Please try again.

userValidation.title: User Validation
userValidation.ignorePwd: You are in ignore user password mode, the userId is {{userId}}.
userValidation.expireMsg: Your session has expired. Please re-login Rocket TE Administration Console, and verify again.

validation.exist: Session name of self-defined session already in use.

validation.min: Min rows cannot be less than 24
validation.max: Max rows cannot be more than 98

validation.min: Min columns cannot be less than 80
validation.max: Max columns cannot be more than 160

validation.required: A number is required for alternate rows.
validation.min: Minimum alternate rows cannot be less than 24.
validation.max: Maximum alternate rows cannot be more than 98.

validation.required: A number is required for alternate columns.
validation.min: Minimum alternate columns cannot be less than 80.
validation.max: Maximum alternate columns cannot be more than 160.

validation.required: A number is required for default rows.
validation.min: Minimum default rows cannot be less than 24.
validation.max: Maximum default rows cannot be more than 98.
validation.pattern: Numeric values only for default rows.

validation.required: A number is required for default columns.
validation.min: Minimum default columns cannot be less than 80.
validation.max: Maximum default columns cannot be more than 160.
validation.pattern: Numeric values only for default columns.
Only alphanumeric and symbols '.', ':', '-' are allowed
